sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button v-on:click="changeState">Turn {{ btnState }}</button>
</template>
<script>
//import { sendClientType, sendState } from "./scripts/sokcetsComs.js";
var io = require("socket.io-client");
var socket = io("http://localhost:3001");

export default {
  name: "NavBar",
  data() {
    return {
      btnState: "On",
    };
  },
  mounted: () => {
    let data = {
        "clientType": "client",
    };
    socket.emit("client-type", data);
  },
  methods: {
    changeState() {
      let arduino;
      socket.emit("get-arduinos", {
        "request": "get-arduinos"
      });
      socket.on("get-arduinos-response", (data) => {
        console.log(data);
        arduino = toString(data[`arduinos_${ 0 }`]);
        console.log(arduino);
      });
      socket.emit("change-state", {
          "btnState": `${ this.btnState }`,
          "target": `${ arduino }`
      });
      socket.on("change-state-response", (data) => {
          console.log(data);
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>
